underlying_goal: Execute a full STEP 1-8 pipeline test to validate v1.50.4 filtering fix, and fix any issues encountered along the way
friction_detail: STEP 2 failed twice due to misdiagnosed timing issue (actually a site_id URL problem), STEP 8 failed due to search_menu not filtering correctly, and a 20MB file read crashed the session
brief_summary: User requested a full STEP 1-8 pipeline test; STEPs 1-7 eventually succeeded after debugging STEP 2, but STEP 8 failed due to a menu filtering bug, and the session was cut short by a file size error before the final fix could be applied.
